imdb.title: Aria: The Animation
imdb.plot: Akari, Aika, and Alice are three girls who share a single dream: to become the most talented gondoliers in all of Neo-Venezia! Every day they train while exploring all the wondrous sights that the water-covered planet Aqua has to ...

episodes.title: That Keepsake Clover...
episodes.plot: Athena has a natural talent for singing, but what special attributes do Akira and Aika possess?

episodes.title: That Encounter at the Carnevale...
episodes.plot: It's time for Neo-Venezia's annual carnevale and Ai has come back to Aqua for a visit.

episodes.title: Looking for That Treasure...
episodes.plot: Akari, Aika, and Alice find a small treasure box and embark on a hunt that spans the entire city.

episodes.title: The Night of the Meteor Shower...
episodes.plot: Love is in the air when Akari, Aika, and Alice decide to watch a meteor shower with Al, one of Neo-Venezia's gravity-controlling Gnomes.

episodes.title: That Neo-Venezia Colored Heart...
episodes.plot: The mailman's gondola is being repaired, so just for today Akari is making the rounds with him to get the job done.

episodes.title: The Wonder of That Rainy Day.../The Discoveries on That Spring Day...
episodes.plot: Akari and Alicia visit a shrine that despite its beauty yields a hint of mystery and danger.

episodes.title: The Smile Reflected in That Mirror...
episodes.plot: Athena notices something strange about Alice: She realizes she doesn't have any friends her own age.

episodes.title: To the Kingdom of Cats...
episodes.plot: The girls see President Aria travel to a mysterious part of the canal that's normally closed off so they decide to follow him.

episodes.title: The Day of Festa Del Bòcolo...
episodes.plot: Festa Del Bocolo has arrived. This is a day where women receive roses from the people who admire them.

episodes.title: Those Honest Stars...
episodes.plot: Competition erupts when Alicia shows she knows many facts about the great city during a tour.

episodes.title: That Heartwarming Town and Its People...
episodes.plot: Aika and Alice decide to follow Akari but soon see they might have to blow their cover when Akari starts talking to a dangerous-looking man in black.

episodes.title: That Precious Sparkle...
episodes.plot: Can Akari handle the pressure from a critical passenger while transporting fragile cargo during her first solo job?

episodes.title: Chasing That Mirage.../The Light From That Nightshine Chime...
episodes.plot: During a heat wave-induced haze, Akari follows President Aria into a mysterious cafe.

episodes.title: Those Really Self-Imposed Rules...
episodes.plot: Alice has created a new challenge for herself: When she walks home from school, she can only step on shadows.

episodes.title: That Newest Memory...
episodes.plot: Akari has her work cut out for her when she decides to undertake a construction project on her own.

episodes.title: The Center of That Large Circle...
episodes.plot: Akari, Akatsuki, and Akria learn about Al's childhood while eating lunch.

episodes.title: Parting with That Gondola...
episodes.plot: Akari receives disturbing news when she takes her gondola in for a routine inspection.

episodes.title: After That Rainy Night...
episodes.plot: On the night before her old gondola is set to be taken away, Akari and Alicia decide to have an evening picnic out on the water.

episodes.title: That New Me...
episodes.plot: Aika leans a little too close to a grill and catches her long, beautiful hair on fire!

episodes.title: The Crybaby.../That Young Girl's Heart...
episodes.plot: Aika decides to leave her sick bed and spy on Akari and Alice while they're at work.

episodes.title: That Shadowless Invitation...
episodes.plot: Akari spots a woman dressed all in black with her face covered. Aika believes this to be the legend of an angry spirit come to life.

episodes.title: That Night of the Galaxy Express...
episodes.plot: Akari believes she will have another encounter with the secretive spirit Cait Sith when mysterious happenings begin taking place.

episodes.title: That Mysterious World.../That Guardian of Aqua...
episodes.plot: Akari innocently suggests that the little space between two stairs at the Aria Company is a portal to another world.

episodes.title: That Sea, Love and Heart...
episodes.plot: Alicia and Akari give a tour to an elderly couple who have come to Neo-Venezia to celebrate their anniversary.

episodes.title: Those Undines of Tomorrow...
episodes.plot: Heavy rain keeps the girls from their usual gondola practice, so they decide to spend the day at Himeya.

episodes.title: The Fruits of That Encounter...
episodes.plot: Akari can't help but be a little distracted as she hasn't heard from Ai in a while, and all her emails have gone unanswered.

episodes.title: That White, Kind City...
episodes.plot: Alicia reveals secrets about her childhood during a playful winter day with Akari.

episodes.title: Sono suteki na kiseki wo...
episodes.plot: Fifteen year-old Akari leaves everything behind to travel to Aqua, a sparkling planet covered in water. More than anything Akari wants to be an undine - a female gondolier who navigates the canals of the Aquan city of Neo-Venezia. As she begins her training with the prestigious Aria Company, will she be up to the challenges that await her on the path to achieve her dream?

episodes.title: Sono tokubetsu na hi wo...
episodes.plot: Aika, a budding undine, has a mentor who is quite strict, so she comes up with a solution to get him off her back: she'll run away to the Aria Company!

episodes.title: Sono tômei na shôjo wo...
episodes.plot: While training in a particularly tough stretch of water, Akari and Aika meet a girl from Orange planet who seems to be having no trouble at all. Her name is Alice, and she's famous for being one of the youngest yet most talented undines in Neo Venezia.

episodes.title: Sono todokanai tegami ha...
episodes.plot: Akari meets a little girl who gives her a letter and requests she deliver it. But if she is going to have any chance of keeping her promise, she'll have to enlist the help of flying messengers known as Sylphs.

episodes.title: Sono aru hazu no nai shima he...
episodes.plot: Akari receives a mysterious hand-written invitation to visit Neverland, but she wonders about the uncertainties that await her as she sets off toward a deserted island.

episodes.title: Sono mamoritai mono ni...
episodes.plot: Alice is in a bad mood because her dorm doesn't allow pets. And to top it off, she's realized her left hand isn't as skilled as her right hand. Now she's determined to discover solutions to each as they're probably connected.

episodes.title: Sono suteki na o shigoto wo...
episodes.plot: The trainees encounter a couple on their honeymoon who think being an undine is simple work. Now it's up to Akira to teach everyone what it really means to be an undine.

episodes.title: Sono yûutsu na shachô tta ra.../Sono iketeru hîrô tte ba..
episodes.plot: It's cleaning time for the Aria Company, and President Aria wants to help out and lead by example for his company. Soon after, President Aria unveils his crime-fighting alter-ego, Nyan-Nyan-Puu!

episodes.title: Sono hoshi no yôna yôsei ha...
episodes.plot: Aika wants to become as good as the legendary Great Water Fairy, the greatest undine of all time. But when she's sent to visit the legend at her house, Aika realizes she's nothing like she expected.

episodes.title: Sono hoka hoka na kyûjitsu ha...
episodes.plot: Winter has come and as a special treat, Alicia suggests that they visit a hot spring. Akari's never seen one before so she's excited to go and soon the remaining trainees decide to join in as well.

episodes.title: Sono orenji no hibi wo...
episodes.plot: On one bleak winter day Alicia, Aika, and Athena sit around a fire, drink cups of hot cocoa, and reminisce about their younger days. Light is shed on how they all came to be friends.

episodes.title: Sono yawaraka na negai ha...
episodes.plot: When Akari sets off to visit the oldest bridge in Neo-Venezia, she senses someone is watching her. Once she arrives, she sees the city is entirely different from how it was before. Now she wonders what strange mysteries the old bridge holds.

episodes.title: Sono masshiro na asa wo...
episodes.plot: It's time to ring in the New Year and everyone in Neo-Venezia has come together to celebrate. But soon Akari and Ai stumble upon a strange New Year's gift from Aqua itself.
